Cleaning and Tidying Data
```{r, include = FALSE}
wine_df = read_csv("./data/winemag-data_first150k.csv")
wine_df = wine_df %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(country,designation, points,price,province,region_1,region_2,variety,winery) %>% 
  drop_na(country)
```
